channel.title: Vortigaunts dissapear in Anomalious Materials.
channel.description:
Hi everyone.
I was playing Black Mesa and I reached the part with the test chamber where you have to push the crystal in that thing. The experiment goes wrong and then you are teleported to Xen for a few seconds. Four vortigaunts show up, but after a few seconds, the last one from the right suddenly disappears.
I didn't managed to do a screen, unfortunately :frowning:
